actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Providing for enclosing the visitors' galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material.

summary.text: Requires the Architect of the Capitol to enclose the visitors' galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material and install equipment so that the House proceedings on the floor will be clearly audible in the galleries.

titles.title: Providing for enclosing the visitors' galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material.
